name: The Day Has Come (VHS Footage)
description:
STORY

The video you are about to see was recorded on VHS during the events that involved numerous American cities in 1987, precisely in the mountains of Colorado. Something mysterious has happened. The video will show only a small part, but how it all began, seen through the eyes of a simple farmer on a weekend retreat in those mountains. The contents are particularly tense and could be considered Top-Secret. Please maintain strict confidentiality. Thanks for your attention.

--------------------CONSTROLS-----------------------

Let's briefly take a look at the Controls now:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Left button / right button - Aim & Shoot with gun

Left Shift - Run

----------------------COMPUTER REQUISITES-----------------------

If everything is clear now let's move on to the system requirements: the video is quite heavy and requires at least 4GB of RAM and 2GB of video memory to be sharp.

Now I leave you, to the next found footage!
